descriptionLine:
I was born in Texas and grew up in Ohio. After graduating high school I moved to Arizona (Maricopa) to pursue a degree in computer programming. After learning the basics from several languages including, Java, C++, C#, Javascript, HTML, CSS, SQL and Python I experimented with each individually. 
 Currently I am practicing and learning more front end web development by coding my portfolio page using HTML, CSS, and Javascript.
